summary: Allows you to collect and dismember the bodies of dead Skeevers, they can be used in potions and cooking.
descriptionHtml:
Dead Skeever

Enables you to collect and dismember the corpses of dead skeevers. All parts of the skeevers body can be used in potions and some parts can be used for cooking. Also the skeever parts can come in handy for leaving in the pockets NPC's you dislike or as a nice present on their bed. 

Requirement:
Skyrim V1.9

Notes:
When activating / searching a dead skeever you are given the option to collect the corpse, if you do so any loot item the skeever has is automatically placed in your inventory along with the dead body itself. The skeever tail has been removed from the death item list, and you gain a tail when you choose the option to dismember.
author: Mindboggles
